post: As someone whoâ€™s gone through depression in the past and still faces it partly today, iâ€™ve always found a great way of working through it was just talking. Thought iâ€™d put this out there so if anyone ever wanted to talk privately they could, iâ€™m always here for yall ðŸ«¶
I don't know what would help besides killing me blowing my brains out all over the wall but I just want it to stop I can't handle living anymore 27 years was enough I want off stop it please
I am 27m. I have been battling gambling addiction for a while. I always tell myself i would stop. This time i fucked up bad.

I was moneyless cause i gambled away my paycheck. It was going well, i didn't need any money so it was fine. Then, the other day, i got fined while driving. I asked for a cash advance on my paycheck, i wanted a small sum (paycheck is due in less than a week anyway), and my boss gave me almost all of it instead. I gambled it away. Again.
I wanted to use that money to go on vacation, to take a break from my bleak life. Now i can't.
27 years and i squandered away everything. I have a good paying job, i should have a lot of money, instead this year i got wrapped into this and can't find a way out.
